nodes.text: The C-10 heavy blaster pistol, also known as the C-10 "Dragoneye Reaper", was a heavy blaster pistol developed by Czerka Arms.

A popular sidearm for bounty hunters, smugglers, and other fringers who valued firepower over subtlety, the C-10 was easily modified, larger than most other heavy blasters, and produced heavy fire that nearly rivaled a full-sized blaster rifle.
While the rights to the C-10 were owned by Czerka Arms, Caliban's Model X and SoroSuub's "Renegade" heavy blaster pistol shared many design and component similarities.

The C-10 "Dragoneye Reaper" was first identified in Star Wars Galaxies, and bears a strong resemblance to another blaster in Galaxies, the Renegade heavy blaster pistol. In newer sourcebook material, specifically Fly Casual & Gadgets and Gear, the C-10 is now a large pistol that bears little similarity to the Renegade; this has been retconned to a degree by saying that the C-10, Renegade, and the Caliban Model X all share components and design similarities.
